title: 12/24/20 DPS - BEST OF
itunes:title: 12/24/20 DPS - BEST OF
description:
Rob Parker and T.J. Houshmandzadeh fill in for Dan Patrick and weigh in on James Harden's future as a Houston Rocket and which team is most likely to make a trade for one of the league's top scorers. Tony Dungy buried Tom Brady on his all-time list but where do Rob and T.J. have the 6x Super Bowl champion ranked? The Pittsburgh Steelers are on a losing streak but can they return to form in time for a lengthy playoff run? Plus, they are joined by Up On Game co-host LaVar Arrington and Patriots insider Ben Volin!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
